description.displayText: Tricia is a phenomenal sitter! She is reliable, punctual, and engages with your child the entire time she is with them. My daughter loved playing with her and Tricia did a great job helping her through some separation anxiety. I can't say enough great things about her and want to highlight that she goes above and beyond. I never worried when she was with my daughter and an added perk is that she cleans up after herself so that there is no mess to clean up when you get home. As a professional who works with children, I highly recommend Tricia. I am so sad we moved away and have to find a new sitter.

description.displayText: Tricia has cared for our family for the past 3 years.  She is SO AWESOME!!!  She is pretty much a part of our family.  Our son adores her.  She works very hard and does not like to be idle.  She cleaned our home, did laundry, cooked his meals, helped with potty-training, chaperoned him at play dates/birthday parties, etc.  She is very considered and respects us our parents.  She asks questions with no problem.  But on days when we had to rush out, she took the lead and made sure to take care of our needs.  The only reason we are not utilizing her services now is we moved out of state.  But whenever we are in the area we will definitely contact her or if we travel we would love for her to join us.  She is such an asset to any family.

description.displayText: Tricia was exactly what I needed for my kids. My kids connected with her right away and she was able to feed and put them to bed just the way I asked her. She was attentive to my detailed instructions and I felt comfortable leaving my kids with her even though it was my and my kids' first time with a babysitter! Thank you Tricia :)
description.originalText: Tricia was exactly what I needed for my kids. My kids connected with her right away and she was able to feed and put them to bed just the way I asked her. She was attentive to my detailed instructions and I felt comfortable leaving my kids with her even though it was my and my kids' first time with a babysitter! Thank you Tricia :)

description.displayText: She was great. Perfect babysitter. My son loved having her take care of him. I will definitely use her services in the future. Thanks again Tricia.
description.originalText: She was great. Perfect babysitter. My son loved having her take care of him. I will definitely use her services in the future. Thanks again Tricia.

description.displayText: She was absolutely PERFECT. It was my first time using Care.com. It was also my birthday and my situation was that if my daughter didn't absolutely fall in love with her within the first 30 minutes then I wasn't going out. My daughter loved her. She had my dish washer unloaded and just perfect. I could not have asked for a better sitter! I will ALWAYS use her on Care.com, unless she is unavailable. But I totally respected that I didn't have to lower my standards (which was NOT happening) in order to find a good sitter on here! Thumbs up Tricia!! <3

description.displayText: Tricia has raised the bar in what I hope to have in a "babysitter".  She was so much more and my daughter loved her.  I would recommend her to anyone.
description.originalText: Tricia has raised the bar in what I hope to have in a "babysitter".  She was so much more and my daughter loved her.  I would recommend her to anyone.

description.displayText: We have used Tricia for sitting for our two boys on several occasions and she has been wonderful!  She is very professional, responsive, punctual and trustworthy, and she is very easy to work with.  Our boys are a little older (8 and 7) and she keeps them entertained and keeps the peace between them, so that we can enjoy a parent's night out.  If you are looking for child care, I highly recommend her!

description.displayText: Tricia was the first sitter I ever hired that was not someone I had a connection to through friends.  She was very sweet and made me comfortable leaving my kids with her right away.  I will be calling her again when the need arises!
description.originalText: Tricia was the first sitter I ever hired that was not someone I had a connection to through friends.  She was very sweet and made me comfortable leaving my kids with her right away.  I will be calling her again when the need arises!

description.displayText: We totally agree with all the other reviewers. Tricia is terrific!  She's trustworthy, punctual, thoughtful, genuine, and finds ways to help out.  Tricia has babysat our 17-month-old son on multiple occasions over the last few months, and he always enjoys being with her.   We leave the house knowing that he's being taken care of in a way that is consistent with our values.  Plus, an added bonus for us is that the house is always in better shape when we return.  We definitely recommend her!
description.originalText: We totally agree with all the other reviewers. Tricia is terrific!  She's trustworthy, punctual, thoughtful, genuine, and finds ways to help out. We leave the house knowing that he's being taken care of in a way that is consistent with our values.  Plus, an added bonus for us is that the house is always in better shape when we return.  We definitely recommend her!

description.displayText: This is my first experience with a professional babysitter, other than friends and family occasionally. I really lucked out to find Tricia on my first try because she has been a godsend! She was able to watch our young toddler for us on short notice with our first time. It was an unexpected treat! Tricia has babysat for us twice so far. She communicates very quickly and clearly, is on time every time and follows my daughter's schedule exactly, including putting her down for naps and administering antibiotics if needed. She is so sweet and has a great positive energy. Tricia even puts away the toys and dishes!!! Love her!
